alert.note: Alert for Habersham; Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 3:57AM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Georgia, Habersham and Rabun Counties. In North Carolina, Buncombe, Henderson, Macon, Southern Jackson, and Transylvania Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp.
